title: A Wolf in Sheep's Clothing
description: Millie the sheepdog lives on a farm and her job is to protect the sheep. The animal friends on the farm tip off Millie that a wolf has taken one of the sheep. Will Millie find the missing sheep before it's too late? A Wolf in Sheep's Clothing is a fun retelling of the classic Aesop Fable, in which readers will learn an important lesson. Colorful, supportive illustrations will keep readers entertained and engaged throughout the story. This book can be used to teach students how to retell a story and sequence events.
meta: field, graze, nervous, pinned, sheepdog, wool
